Summary: Bright object, random seemingly controlled flight.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Rome
There were no other sightings in Rome on or around August 10th 2002
divs: sighting detailsobject appeared at sundown from the west, rose as the stars did travelling inwest to east dir. stopped\slowed at pos almost directly overhead began randomflight path with minor but defininte direction changes. at times would move instraight line then would turn in clockwise direction then stop, turn otherdirection. at times during turns, increase in speed was observed.object wouldthen slow down and continue flight. object continued to travel in randomdirections never the same, no onserved pattern. was unlike sattelite movementpossible space station although am unaware of actual position. movement did notseem to be reflection w\ angle of light change.ex.light reflected fromcylindrical object moving erraticly
